page.title: 09Sports Clubs in the Cowtons
page.content: Sport is important in the villages. North Cowton has a junior football team which has achieved success in the Richmondshire District Junior League. Cowton Football Team comprises of men from both villages. Until recently it played on a rough field on the out- skirts of E Cowton, but now uses a newly made pitch on N Cowton playing field. East Cowton Cricket Club draws players from both villages. It is in the B Division of the Darlington League and has a good field in the centre of E Cowton. With help from a 100 Club it has had a new pavilion built in recent years. In E Cowton there is a Tennis Club, which uses a hard court built by a local farmer. N Cowton hopes to build a court next year. It will cost Â£7400. Grants have been received from the Sports Council and the Parish Councils.
